info.short_description: For progressives, leftists, socialists, anarchists, Marxists, environmentalists, vegans, anti-fascists, LGBTQ+, human rights activists, etc.
info.full_description:
[en] Todon.nl is a Mastodon instance for progressives, leftists, socialists, anarchists, Marxists, (left-wing) activists, environmentalists, vegans, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, pirates, LGBTQ+, human rights activists, etc. Please join us!

[nl] Todon.nl is een Mastodonserver voor progressievelingen, linkse mensen, socialisten, anarchisten, Marxisten, (linkse) activisten, milieubewuste mensen, vegans, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, piraten, LGBTQ+, mensenrechtenactivisten, enz. Meld je aan!

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for the University of Twente community.
info.full_description:
A Mastodon instance for the University of Twente community.
Membership is restricted to students, alumni and employees of the University of Twente.
Content posted on this instance does not reflect the opinions or policies of the University of Twente.

info.short_description: Mastodon instance hosted by the Pirate Party Belgium
info.full_description:
We expect that everybody respects values shared by our Basic Text when s·he speaks on our instance : https://pirateparty.be/basic-text/

Nous nous attendons à ce que chacun·e respecte les valeurs véhiculées par notre Texte de Base lorsqu'iel s'exprime sur notre instance : https://fr.pirateparty.be/texte-de-base/

We verwachten dat hij/zij die op onze instantie spreekt de waarden gedeeld door onze Basistekst, respecteert : https://nl.pirateparty.be/basistekst/

info.short_description: ieji.de is useable via .onion, fast and well secured plus ES and CDN!
info.full_description:
ieji.de is powered by a powerful dedicated server, has a good 1Gbps DE-CIX uplink, DDoS protection, best possible TLS settings without locking too much out(like Android) and a Tor onion link if you need a bit anonymity.

We are a liberal instance based in Frankfurt. Blocking other instances only on really harsh misbehaviour. And instance whitelisting is a no go.

Feel free to join, you can always delete your account.

Elasticsearch is enabled

Minio CDN is enabled

Mastodon instance for the Dutch community, but open to anyone. Primary languages Dutch and English.
Mastodon instance for the Nederlandse gemeenschap, maar open voor iedereen. Voertaal voornamelijk Nederlands en Engels.

info.short_description: Une fois pour TOOT ! A Mastodon in Brussels.
info.full_description:
Petites Singularités vous invite, en direct de Bruxelles, à l'éveil d'un mastodonte... Live from Brussels! Live vanuit Brussel!

This instance is provided by Petites Singularités ASBL for like-minded people in Brussels and elsewhere. P.S.: works with free software and grassroots activists across disciplines, ranging from agro-ecology to cartography, libre aesthetics & ethics, (self-)organization & policy.
